sentences.sContent: A Hindu ascetic, or sadhu, wrapped in a bright-red cloth, smokes underneath a vad (banyan) tree outside a temple in Mumbai (Bombay), India.
sentences.sContent_eng: A Hindu ascetic, or sadhu, wrapped in a bright-red cloth, smokes underneath a vad (banyan) tree outside a temple in Mumbai (Bombay), India.
sentences.sCn: 印度孟买，一个教禁欲主义者或苦行僧，包裹在明亮的红色衣服里，在榕树下吸烟。
